classes.name: Barbarian

perks.Rage: Increases damage output and grants resistance to damage types.
perks.Unarmored Defense: Can add Constitution modifier to AC while not wearing armor.
perks.Reckless Attack: Grants advantage on attacks but also grants advantage to enemies attacking you.

classes.description: Barbarians are fierce warriors who use their rage to enhance their combat abilities.

classes.name: Bard

perks.Bardic Inspiration: Can grant allies a bonus die to enhance their rolls.
perks.Spellcasting: Has access to a variety of spells that enhance allies and hinder foes.
perks.Jack of All Trades: Can add half proficiency to any skill not already proficient in.

classes.description: Bards are versatile performers and spellcasters, capable of inspiring allies and using magic to manipulate outcomes.

classes.name: Cleric

perks.Divine Domain: Gains features from a chosen domain that shapes their magical abilities.
perks.Channel Divinity: A variety of powerful effects specific to their chosen domain.
perks.Spellcasting: Draws upon divine power to cast spells that heal, protect, and smite.

classes.description: Clerics are versatile spellcasters who draw their magic from divine sources.

classes.name: Druid

perks.Wild Shape: Can transform into various animals to aid in combat and exploration.
perks.Druid Circle: Specialized paths that provide unique abilities and spells.
perks.Spellcasting: Utilizes nature-based magic to heal, shape-shift, and control the environment.

classes.description: Druids are nature-focused spellcasters who can transform into animals and wield primal magic.

classes.name: Fighter

perks.Fighting Style: Choose from a variety of combat styles that provide bonuses in battle.
perks.Second Wind: Allows a quick recovery of hit points during battle.
perks.Action Surge: Grants an additional action on your turn.

classes.description: Fighters are highly trained warriors, proficient in a wide range of weapons and armor.

classes.name: Monk

perks.Martial Arts: Enables use of Dexterity for unarmed strikes and monk weapons.
perks.Ki: Provides energy for special abilities like Flurry of Blows and Step of the Wind.
perks.Unarmored Movement: Increases movement speed while not wearing armor.

classes.description: Monks are martial artists who harness their inner energy to perform extraordinary physical feats.

classes.name: Paladin

perks.Divine Sense: Detects the presence of strong evil and good forces.
perks.Lay on Hands: Heals using a pool of hit points.
perks.Divine Smite: Adds radiant damage to melee attacks.

classes.description: Paladins are holy warriors bound to a sacred oath, blending martial prowess with divine magic.

classes.name: Ranger

perks.Favored Enemy: Grants bonuses when tracking and attacking chosen enemies.
perks.Natural Explorer: Increases proficiency in wilderness navigation and survival.
perks.Spellcasting: Uses nature-based magic to enhance their combat abilities and utility.

classes.description: Rangers are skilled hunters and trackers, often bonded with nature and capable of using spells.

classes.name: Rogue

perks.Sneak Attack: Deals extra damage when attacking with advantage or when an ally is nearby.
perks.Cunning Action: Allows bonus actions for quick movement and stealth.
perks.Evasion: Can avoid damage from area effects.

classes.description: Rogues are agile and stealthy characters who excel at dealing precision damage and avoiding danger.

classes.name: Sorcerer

perks.Sorcerous Origin: Grants unique powers and spells based on their magical heritage.
perks.Metamagic: Allows customization of spells to enhance their effects.
perks.Spellcasting: Innate magical abilities drawn from an inner source of power.

classes.description: Sorcerers wield innate magic, drawn from their lineage or other mystical sources.

classes.name: Warlock

perks.Otherworldly Patron: Gains unique powers from a pact with a powerful being.

classes.description: Warlocks forge pacts with powerful entities to gain magical abilities and spells.

classes.name: Wizard

perks.Arcane Recovery: Regains expended spell slots after a short rest.
perks.Spellbook: Contains spells known to the wizard.
perks.Arcane Tradition: Specialized schools of magic provide unique features.

classes.description: Wizards are scholarly magic-users who harness the power of arcane spells.

classes.name: Artificer

perks.Magical Tinkering: Imbues small objects with magical properties.
perks.Tool Expertise: Proficiency with artisan's tools, used for creating inventions and enhancements.

classes.description: Artificers are inventors who blend magic with craftsmanship to create magical objects and devices.
